description: This Kotlin source file defines a Fragment (CartFragment) for an Android application. The fragment manages the user's shopping cart interface, including displaying cart items, applying promo codes, editing item options, and placing orders. It interacts with repositories for cart data, promo codes, and delivery, and handles UI updates and user interactions.

classes.name: CartFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that handles the shopping cart UI and interactions within the food delivery app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the adapter for the cart, setting up callbacks for item quantity change, removal, and editing.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout for the fragment from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up event listeners, and observes LiveData from repositories to update UI accordingly.

methods.name: openEditOptions
methods.description: Opens a bottom sheet for editing item options if applicable.

methods.name: renderTotals
methods.description: Updates the totals section of the UI based on the provided CartTotals data.
